welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Colesville, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves Delta Air Lines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the IAD Free Wi-Fi network.
